Reviews.Title: “Comfortable Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Roodboy
Reviews.Content: centrally located clean adequate holiday stay highlight hotel rooftop pool pool plenty seating sun undercover unfortunately jacuzzi action gym adequate basic breakfast selection quality queue morning little unnecessary especially spare tables disorganised staff letting people jump queue families waited patiently tested patience plenty guests hotel worth staying undergoing renovations stayed easy walk central singapore
